select * from (select
from MEDREC.PAT_VISIT where PATIENT_ID = #{0} order by ADMISSION_DATE_TIME desc ) where rownum <3
select * from MEDREC.PAT_VISIT where PATIENT_ID = #{0} and discharge_date_time is null

update MEDREC.PAT_VISIT
DEPT_ADMISSION_TO = #{deptAdmissionTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMISSION_DATE_TIME = #{admissionDateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
DEPT_DISCHARGE_FROM = #{deptDischargeFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCHARGE_DATE_TIME = #{dischargeDateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
OCCUPATION = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTITY = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARMED_SERVICES = #{armedServices,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_IN_CONTRACT = #{unitInContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_TYPE = #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKING_STATUS = #{workingStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INSURANCE_TYPE = #{insuranceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURANCE_NO = #{insuranceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_AGENCY = #{serviceAgency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAILING_ADDRESS = #{mailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXT_OF_KIN = #{nextOfKin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELATIONSHIP = #{relationship,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXT_OF_KIN_ADDR = #{nextOfKinAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXT_OF_KIN_ZIPCODE = #{nextOfKinZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXT_OF_KIN_PHONE = #{nextOfKinPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATIENT_CLASS = #{patientClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMISSION_CAUSE = #{admissionCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSULTING_DATE = #{consultingDate,jdbcType=DATE},
PAT_ADM_CONDITION = #{patAdmCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSULTING_DOCTOR = #{consultingDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMITTED_BY = #{admittedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMER_TREAT_TIMES = #{emerTreatTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ESC_EMER_TIMES = #{escEmerTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SERIOUS_COND_DAYS = #{seriousCondDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CRITICAL_COND_DAYS = #{criticalCondDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ICU_DAYS = #{icuDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CCU_DAYS = #{ccuDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SPEC_LEVEL_NURS_DAYS = #{specLevelNursDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIRST_LEVEL_NURS_DAYS = #{firstLevelNursDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SECOND_LEVEL_NURS_DAYS = #{secondLevelNursDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUTOPSY_INDICATOR = #{autopsyIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BLOOD_TYPE = #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BLOOD_TYPE_RH = #{bloodTypeRh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFUSION_REACT_TIMES = #{infusionReactTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BLOOD_TRAN_TIMES = #{bloodTranTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BLOOD_TRAN_VOL = #{bloodTranVol,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BLOOD_TRAN_REACT_TIMES = #{bloodTranReactTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DECUBITAL_ULCER_TIMES = #{decubitalUlcerTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ALERGY_DRUGS = #{alergyDrugs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADVERSE_REACTION_DRUGS = #{adverseReactionDrugs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MR_VALUE = #{mrValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MR_QUALITY = #{mrQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOLLOW_INDICATOR = #{followIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FOLLOW_INTERVAL = #{followInterval,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FOLLOW_INTERVAL_UNITS = #{followIntervalUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIRECTOR = #{director,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTENDING_DOCTOR = #{attendingDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR_IN_CHARGE = #{doctorInCharge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCHARGE_DISPOSITION = #{dischargeDisposition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL_COSTS = #{totalCosts,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_PAYMENTS = #{totalPayments,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CATALOG_DATE = #{catalogDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CATALOGER = #{cataloger,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOP_UNIT = #{topUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_SYSTEM_INDICATOR = #{serviceSystemIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTERNAL_NO = #{internalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTITY_CLASS = #{identityClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BODY_WEIGHT = #{bodyWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BODY_HEIGHT = #{bodyHeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEDICAL_PAY_WAY = #{medicalPayWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HBSAG_INDICATOR = #{hbsagIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HCV_AB_INDICATOR = #{hcvAbIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HIV_AB_INDICATOR = #{hivAbIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHIEF_DOCTOR = #{chiefDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADVANCED_STUDIES_DOCTOR = #{advancedStudiesDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRACTICE_DOCTOR_OF_GRADUATE = #{practiceDoctorOfGraduate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRACTICE_DOCTOR = #{practiceDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR_OF_CONTROL_QUALITY = #{doctorOfControlQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NURSE_OF_CONTROL_QUALITY = #{nurseOfControlQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATE_OF_CONTROL_QUALITY = #{dateOfControlQuality,jdbcType=DATE},
FIRST_CASE_INDICATOR = #{firstCaseIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
THIRD_LEVEL_NURS_DAYS = #{thirdLevelNursDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
X_EXAM_NO = #{xExamNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAINING_INJURY_INDICATOR = #{trainingInjuryIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HEALTH_LEVEL = #{healthLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MR_INFECT_REPORT = #{mrInfectReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFECT_INDICATOR = #{infectIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZYLSH = #{zylsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INQUIRY_INDICATOR = #{inquiryIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PIGEONHOLE = #{pigeonhole,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NURSE_MR_COMMIT = #{nurseMrCommit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NURSE_MR_COMMIT_TIME = #{nurseMrCommitTime,jdbcType=DATE},
ABNORMAL = #{abnormal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPECIAL_VALUE_INDICATOR = #{specialValueIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MR_DESC = #{mrDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEIGHT = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PATIENT_CONDITION = #{patientCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOSPITAL_CODE = #{hospitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCHARGE_AGE = #{dischargeAge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INP_SERIAL_NO = #{inpSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VISIT_ID = #{visitId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
